text: Isabelle Yasmine Adjani (born June 27, 1955) is a French actress, producer and singer. In 2010, she was made Chevalier of the Legion of Honour. She has won more CÃ©sar Awards than any other performer. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:French movie actors Category:French television actors Category:Actors from Paris Category:Singers from Paris Category:1955 births Category:Living people
